Description: It collates and analyses a wide range of publically available data on prevalence, risk, prevention, early intervention, assessment, treatment, outcomes and service costs. It provides commissioners, service providers, clinicians, services users and their families with the means to benchmark their area against similar populations and gain intelligence about what works.
Name: Common Mental Health Disorders
Route from landing page to data: Fingertips Data can be located by clicking on the Green box named 'Start Go to the data' to the right of the introduction.
Sizing Notes: Fingertips  May be better suited to a mental health familiy
